Name: Dragon War
About the game: current version includes a basic single battle mode with AI in a simple map with weather effects and day night systems. you can choose one of the six flying dragons that you like to fight with computer players in the scene. Including Dragonsï¼š #1 Desert Dragon. #2 Forest Dragon. #3 Plains Dragon. #4 Polar Dragon. #5 Undead Dragon. #6 Volcano Dragon.
